biotools.summary:
An Unbiased Data Set for Machine Learning and Virtual Screening.

15 target sets, 9780 actives,and 407839 inactives from high-confidence PubChem Bioassay data.

LIT-PCBA: A dataset for virtual screening and machine learninig.
